pages.title: Spit Rotisserie
pages.text: The spit rotisserie is a new way of cooking certain animals. It currently only accepts pig and cow carcasses.

The rotisserie must have a campfire beneath it to work correctly. Once you have everything setup you simply need to: $(li)1. Place a drained pig or cow onto the rotisserie $(li)2. Wait until the carcass is cooked, you will be able to tell as it will change color. $(li)3. Right click with a knife to remove cuts of meat.
